entry.title: axios vue è‡ªå·±å°è£…
entry.summary:
utils request.js æ–‡æ¡£(https://www.kancloud.cn/liweiliang/axios/1328148)

import axios from "axios"; //å¼•å…¥axios
// åˆ›å»ºå®ä¾‹
let instance = axios.create({
baseURL: "http://127.0.0.1:3000/", // apiæ¥å£åœ°å€
timeout: 30000, // å»¶æ—¶æ—¶é—´
});

// get æ–¹æ³•
export let $get = async (url, data) => {
return ({ data } = await instance.get(url, { params: data }));
};
// post æ–¹æ³•
export let $post = async (url, data) => {
return ({ data } = await instance.post(url, data));
};

utils request.js æ–‡æ¡£(https://www.kancloud.cn/liweiliang/axios/1328148)

import axios from "axios"; //å¼•å…¥axios
// åˆ›å»ºå®ä¾‹
let instance = axios.create({
baseURL: "http://127.0.0.1:3000/", // apiæ¥å£åœ°å€
timeout: 30000, // å»¶æ—¶æ—¶é—´
});

// get æ–¹æ³•
export let $get = async (url, data) => {
return ({ data } = await instance.get(url, { params: data }));
};
// post æ–¹æ³•
export let $post = async (url, data) => {
return ({ data } = await instance.post(url, data));
};

api user.js
import { $post } from "../utils/request";
// ç™»å½•æ–¹æ³•
export let $login = async (url, params) => {
let res = await $post(url, params);
return res;
};

ä½¿ç”¨:
const FN = async (values) => {
let res = await $login("users/login", values);
console.log(res.data);
};

res.header('Access-Control-Allow-Headers', '*');

res.header('Access-Control-Allow-Methods', 'PUT, POST, GET, DELETE, OPTIONS');
next();
});
